{"id":879134347,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1673864010,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"59 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/879134347/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"80.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int solve(string s, string t, int x, int y, vector<vector<int> > &dp){\n        if(x==0) return y;\n        if(y==0) return x;\n        if(dp[x][y]!=-1) return dp[x][y];\n        if(s[x-1]==t[y-1]) return dp[x][y]=solve(s, t, x-1, y-1, dp);\n        else{\n            int insert=1+solve(s,t,x,y-1, dp);\n            int del=1+solve(s,t,x-1, y, dp);\n            int replace=1+solve(s,t, x-1, y-1, dp);\n            return dp[x][y]=min(min(insert,del), replace);\n        }\n    }\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        /*Using DP - Concept of LCS*/\n        vector<vector<int> > dp(word1.length()+1, vector<int>(word2.length()+1, -1));\n        return solve(word1, word2, word1.length(), word2.length(), dp);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false}
